name: Wind Witch
description: The Wind Witch is a Large plant creature that can fly and possesses a cunning ability to use fire-based attacks. It can regenerate in the form of a tumbleweed when reduced to 0 hit points.
memorable: It can transform into a tumbleweed to escape defeat and has risky interactions with fire which make it a dangerous opponent.
goals: To ambush adventurers and utilize its fire abilities for maximal damage.
relations: May be encountered alongside other chaotic evil creatures in areas that promote flight and flames.
environment: Thrives in environments conducive to flight and fire.
strengths: High Dexterity makes it nimble and evasive; can regenerate in tumbleweed form.
weaknesses: Very low Strength and Intelligence scores hinder its physical and cognitive capabilities.
attacks: Can perform two Slam attacks or one Slam and its Capture ability; Slam deals both bludgeoning and piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Cursed Plant allows it to escape and regenerate unless it was damaged by fire.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures even while blind.
skills: Average perception skills with a passive score of 12.
additional_information: Regains 5 hit points each hour in tumbleweed form unless affected by fire.
Catches fire when damaged by fire, continually taking damage.
Can engulf a creature and restrain them, causing damage if they try to move.
test_queries: plant creature that can fly and regenerate
Wind Witch capture and fire tactics
creature that transforms into tumbleweed when defeated
